name: Level switch
description:
You play as a cube that has the ability to switch the level. You must keep switching the level to make progress encountering different enemies and obstacles along the way.

There are two variants of the levels. The calm white version and when you press s to switch the level you are thrown into the alternate evil back version. The only way to get through this game is too keep switching between them in order to reach new platforms or dodge the enemies blocking your way.

This game is my submission for the GeoJam 2021 hosted by the youtuber icoso. I created this game in under one week for the jam.

In this jam you could only use geometric shapes

The lighting effect was created using this

The soundtracks are from opengameart.org and freesound.org
